answers.answer: They didn't have me do mines until i was 26wks with my 2nd baby and now I'm on my 3rd baby and that's round the time they did it again never heard them doing it b 4  for 20weeks
When you go back I'm pretty sure they will make you get the test done
Glucose test is between 24-28 weeks.... the only time they would do it earlier is if you had gestational diabetes in a previous pregnancy.

Oki, I got an appointment in week 28. But thats just a regular check up as they didnt say anything els. And I should fast befor the test but havent gotten ant letter about it.Ohh this new hospital and diffrent way is making me confused. With my first preg everyrhing happend in one plays, now I have to go diffrent playses some couple of miles away for my diffrent appointment

They don't only test you early if you've had gestational diabetes. I have big babies and have never had diabetes, but they made me test early with my last two pregnancies. At 19-20 weeks, and then again at the normal 26-28 weeks. Still no diabetes lol. They will probably tell you to get the test done that day or week if your appt is at 28 weeks.
